text: Soni pati am'bichilile awala waakukulupilila ma Aya Getu, basi jilani: “Ntendele uwe kukwenu! M'mbuje gwenu alichisisye chanasa, kuti jwatesile mwa jenumanja chakusakala mwaujinga kaneka nikutenda toba panyuma pakwe, ni kwilanya (itendo yakwe), basi Jwalakwe (Allah) ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope.”
